column4: Firefox keeps eating up my processor! It seems that it happens randomly and all I gotta do is download a new browser like flock at getdeb.net. There is the .deb installer to DL but the question here is: how to uninstall a program installed manually?
the weird part is when you run a .flv file through totem media player, it doesn't require too much power processor  but viewing a flash movie @ youtube burns my processor...
agreed, youtube embedded videos on my pentium 3 kills it
